General.Name: Real Luck Group Ltd
General.Description: Real Luck Group Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, operates online betting platform in the Isle of Man. It operates Luckbox, an esports betting platform which provides real-money wagering on esports, sports, and casino games. The company offers players to bet on video game events and matches across thirteen game titles and ten sports. Real Luck Group Ltd. is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 350 7th Avenue SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2P 3N9
